column3: utACK @jonasschnelli has documentation written, it just needs to be included here.\n
Also tested, works good. (I gave a utACK above).   Please update docs/release notes as you see fit.\n

I have added a short documentation in the `release-notes.md` and in the `reduce-traffic.md` doc (feel free to overhaul). Also i smuggled in a rename from `reducetraffic.md` to `reduce-traffic.md` (which would be silly to do in a separated PR). All other doc filename use the same pattern.\n
Is this already mentioned in the release notes and/or documentation?\n

I think it's more or less adequately explained by the documentation for whitelist.

Though the release note for maxupload target could mention it too.
